Overview[]: Marco is a friendly, helpful, and brave survivor. He is a loyal ally, helping whenever he is needed and appears to be on good terms with majority of people in the communities. He is shown to be more than willing to put his life on the line for his people, participating in many battles. He is a faithful friend, helping Elijah with Lydia knowing that he has a crush on her.
Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Marco's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Marco joined a community called the Hilltop Colony where he became one of the supply runners.
Death[]: Killed By Leah Shaw Despite a bomb trap in the Barrington House being successful in taking out some Commonwealth soldiers, Leah manages to avoid the explosion from the outside and kills Marco as the group plans to find their camp.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Marco has killed: Jesse (Before Reanimation, alongside Lydia and Elijah ) Sorensen (Alongside Maggie, Elijah, and Lydia) At least 12 unnamed Whisperers (Alongside Daryl , Carol , Jerry , Magna , Luke , Kelly , Lydia , and Jules ) 3 unnamed Commonwealth soldiers (1 Alive, alongside Maggie, Elijah, and Lydia) Numerous counts of zombies
Gallery[]: For more images of Marco, please visit Marco (TV Series)/Gallery .
Trivia[]: Marco is the last Hilltop resident to die. Marco appears in the final flashbacks of the last episode " Rest in Peace ".
